name: SOGGY Medieval Castles
description:
FREE Android Game

- Discover Medieval Castles

- Fight with Medieval Zombies Cakes

- Discover 50 diferent levels

- 2D graphics last generation

Soggy this in medieval times. Where the kings lived in castles. Great Knights fought epic battles. But now, hordes of zombie cakes have invaded the kingdoms! You must rid the world of this plague!

The game controls are very simple, if you move the device sideways you can slide down the world. With a tap on the screen you jump, and two taps you can shoot.

Discover more about FY studio:

http://fystudiogames.com/
